    setAuthenticated()

    setHeader()

    setLayout()

    setMeta()
  • Add a Header to a PDF
    setPDFHeader()
  • Sets the value of an sfConfig variable.
    setProcessVar()
  • Sets the HTTP Status Property for the Current Page
    setStatus()
  • Assigns the HTML Template to the current widget's output. Default for all widgets is the widget name, ".template.php", but this would be modified to be $name.".template.php".
    setTemplate()
  • Sets the Title of the Current Page
    setTitle()

Assigns an array of key/value pairs to an XMLForm. Use to apply custom default values to a form.

addItem(array $items) 

  $item["key_1"] = "value1";
  $item["key_2"] = "value2";
  $this -> addItem( $item );

name addItem

Parameters

$items

array

Create an Excel Spreadsheet as a Binary Stream from a PDO Result Set. The "Args" param should include the filename, and the location.

createExcel(\PDO_Recordsest $rs, string $result_name, string $titlename, string $args) : \BinaryStream

  $args["filename"] = "SomeFile";
  $args["location"] = "/var/foo/bar";

name createExcel

Parameters

$rs

\PDO_Recordsest

$result_name

string

$titlename

string

$args

string

Returns

\BinaryStream

userDir() 

name userDir
deprecated

XML Data List Generator, creates an XML Tree from a specific array.

xmlList(array $data, string $type, string $ret, string $base) : mixed

Type refers to the method in which a list is rendered in HTML, as CSS Divs or as a table with tr/td tags.

A "standard" ret results in an HTML List element, a "return" ret will return the modified array, and the default is to add the list to the current XML Tree, if using Styroform. Base refers to the base nodeelement in a Styroform XML Tree that the list would be appended to.

name xmlList

Parameters

$data

array

$type

string
  • "css,table"

$ret

string
  • "standard,return"

$base

string

Returns

mixed

 Properties
